computeCapabilities.name: Financial Metrics Scorer
computeCapabilities.description: Calculates a score component from financial data.

computeCapabilities.name: Qualitative Metrics Scorer
computeCapabilities.description: Calculates a score component from qualitative data.

computeCapabilities.name: Weighted Average Adjuster
computeCapabilities.description: Combines component scores using weights and applies adjustments.

computeCapabilities.name: Data Loader
computeCapabilities.description: Loads data from a specified source configuration.

computeCapabilities.name: Field Aggregator
computeCapabilities.description: Aggregates fields from multiple data inputs based on a map.

computeCapabilities.name: Ratio Calculator
computeCapabilities.description: Calculates a ratio from numerator and denominator.

computeCapabilities.name: Basic Ratio Calculator
computeCapabilities.description: Calculates numerator / denominator. Raises error for zero denominator.

computeCapabilities.name: Simple Metric Scorer
computeCapabilities.description: Compares a metric against a threshold with an operator.

inputs.name: threshold
inputs.description: The threshold value to compare against.

inputs.name: operator
inputs.description: Comparison operator (e.g., '>', '<', '=='). Defaults to '>' if not provided.

outputs.name: assessment
outputs.description: String indicating the result of the comparison (e.g., 'Above Threshold').

computeCapabilities.name: Financial Analysis Agent
computeCapabilities.description: Agent that calculates ratios and generates textual summaries using skills and SharedContext.

outputs.name: analysis_summary_output
outputs.description: Summary of analysis performed, including status, messages, and results from skills.

computeCapabilities.name: Standard Data Ingestor Agent
computeCapabilities.description: Agent responsible for ingesting initial data from CACM inputs into SharedContext.

inputs.name: financialStatementData
inputs.description: Object containing currentAssets, currentLiabilities, totalDebt, totalEquity.

inputs.name: mockStructuredFinancialsForLLMSummary
inputs.description: Object with financial data points for summarization.

inputs.name: riskFactorsText
inputs.description: Full text of risk factors section.

inputs.name: documentURI
inputs.description: A URI for a primary document.

inputs.name: documentType
inputs.description: Type of the primary document if URI is provided.

outputs.name: ingestion_summary
outputs.description: Summary of data ingestion process, including status and list of stored keys.

computeCapabilities.name: Standard Report Generator Agent
computeCapabilities.description: Agent responsible for assembling the final report from SharedContext.

inputs.name: report_title_detail
inputs.description: Specific detail to add to the report title.

outputs.name: final_report_text
outputs.description: The fully assembled credit report text.
